metadata.title: CVE-2017-9779 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
OCaml compiler allows attackers to have unspecified impact via unknownvectors, a similar issue to CVE-2017-9772 "but with much less impact."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9779` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ocaml - 4.05.0-10ubuntu1
ocaml-base - 4.05.0-10ubuntu1
ocaml-base-nox - 4.05.0-10ubuntu1
ocaml-compiler-libs - 4.05.0-10ubuntu1
ocaml-interp - 4.05.0-10ubuntu1
ocaml-man - 4.05.0-10ubuntu1
ocaml-nox - 4.05.0-10ubuntu1
ocaml-source - 4.05.0-10ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ocaml package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.05.0-10ubuntu1').
